.. _`form_control_common_props`:

Common Properties
.................

All the form control components have besides the HTML standard properties also following properties:

+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| Property           | Type             | Default | Required | Use                                              |
+====================+==================+=========+==========+==================================================+
| label              | node             | \-      | \-       | Text or element to be displayed as label         |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| readOnly           | bool             | \-      | \-       | To display the component as read only            |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| onChange           | func             | \-      | \-       | A callback fired when change event occurs        |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| name               | string           | \-      | yes      | Name of the control, used to reference form data |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| mandatory          | bool             | \-      | \-       | To display the component as mandatory            |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| mandatoryEmptyHint | bool             | \-      | \-       | To display the component is mandatory and empty  |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
| validationState    | string, one of:  | \-      | \-       | To display the component in corresponding        |
|                    |                  |         |          | style                                            |
|                    | - success        |         |          |                                                  |
|                    | - warning        |         |          |                                                  |
|                    | - error          |         |          |                                                  |
+--------------------+------------------+---------+----------+--------------------------------------------------+
